column2: # Fit the initial model without random slopes
Happy_M5_initial <- lmer(Happiness_score ~ log(GDP) + Internet + Health + Military + Unemployment + (1 | Region), data = countries_with_happy)
# Fit the model with random slopes
Happy_M5_random_slopes <- lmer(Happiness_score ~ log(GDP) + Internet + Health + Military + Unemployment + (Unemployment | Region), data = countries_with_happy)
refitting model(s) with ML (instead of REML)
# View the likelihood ratio test results
Happy_M5_initial: Happiness_score ~ log(GDP) + Internet + Health + Military + Unemployment + (1 | Region)
Happy_M5_random_slopes: Happiness_score ~ log(GDP) + Internet + Health + Military + Unemployment + (Unemployment | Region)
